title: Journalists will join forces with lawyers to fight back in court
description: In 2026, journalists will need to assert their rights against governments and, when they hit a wall, join forces with lawyers to fight back in court. The first year of the second Trump administration has already seen new heights in unlawful efforts to cut off access to information (and to punish newsrooms for doing their...
